abstract.p: National Medical Card Systems Inc completes acquisition of Pharmacy Associates Inc for $6 million in cash and 400,000 shares of common stock and additional $2 million in cash and stock over two year period if certain financial targets are met (S)

block.p: National Medical Health Card Systems Inc. (Nasdaq: NMHC), a prescription benefit plan based in Port Washington, has completed its acquisition of Pharmacy Associates Inc. of Little Rock, Ark.

The shareholders of Pharmacy Associates received $6 million in cash and 400,000 shares of National Medical common stock, and will receive an additional $2 million in cash and common stock over a two-year period if certain financial targets are met.
National Medical Health Card Systems Inc. (Nasdaq: NMHC), a prescription benefit plan based in Port Washington, has completed its acquisition of Pharmacy Associates Inc. of Little Rock, Ark.

The shareholders of Pharmacy Associates received $6 million in cash and 400,000 shares of National Medical common stock, and will receive an additional $2 million in cash and common stock over a two-year period if certain financial targets are met.
NMHC shares were traded at about $2.50 each on Wednesday, putting the current value of the takeover at about $7 million.
